languages.text: "В том, что Империум — гниющий труп, как и его никчемный владыка. Черви копошатся в его чреве и молятся разлагающемуся остову, веря, что он защитит их от стихии. Они чавкают преющей плотью и срыгивают ее друг другу в глотки, давясь и захлебываясь. А труп лишь гниет и ветшает. Бури и падальщики срывают смрадное мясо с его хрупких костей, кусок за куском, пока черви в страхе латают зияющие раны своей плотью".

"That the Imperium is a rotting corpse, as is its worthless master. Worms writhe inside its guts, praying to the putrescent husk, believing that it will protect them from the storm. They swallow the damp flesh, smack their lips, and vomit it into each other's throats, gorging, choking. And all the while, the crumbling corpse only continues to rot away. Storms and carrion eaters pick the reeking flesh off its brittle bones, piece by piece, as the frightened worms struggle to mend the gaping wounds with their own flesh."
languages.original_text: "В том, что Империум — гниющий труп, как и его никчемный владыка. Черви копошатся в его чреве и молятся разлагающемуся остову, веря, что он защитит их от стихии. languages.text: « L'Imperium est un cadavre en putréfaction, à l'image de son maître indigne. Ses entrailles grouillent d'asticots qui prient cette carcasse puante dans l'espoir qu'elle les protège de la tempête. Ils ingurgitent sa chair moite, claquent les lèvres et se vomissent mutuellement dans la gorge au point de s'en étouffer. Et pendant ce temps, ce corps moribond continue à pourrir lentement mais sûrement. Morceau par morceau, tempêtes et charognards arrachent la chair nauséabonde à ses os fragiles, alors que les vers terrifiés se démènent pour panser leurs propres plaies béantes. »
languages.original_text: "That the Imperium is a rotting corpse, as is its worthless master. Worms writhe inside its guts, praying to the putrescent husk, believing that it will protect them from the storm. They swallow the damp flesh, smack their lips, and vomit it into each other's throats, gorging, choking. And all the while, the crumbling corpse only continues to rot away. Storms and carrion eaters pick the reeking flesh off its brittle bones, piece by piece, as the frightened worms struggle to mend the gaping wounds with their own flesh."

languages.text: «Que el Imperium es un cadáver en descomposición, al igual que su indigno amo. Los gusanos se retuercen entre sus entrañas, rezando a sus restos putrefactos, creyendo que puede protegerlos de la tormenta. Tragan su carne húmeda, se relamen y la vomitan a la garganta de sus hermanos, colmándose, ahogándose. Y mientras tanto, el cuerpo desmoronado sigue gangrenándose. Las tormentas y los carroñeros le arrancan la apestosa carne a sus huesos quebradizos, bocado a bocado, mientras los gusanos aterrados se desviven por coser las brutales hendiduras con su propia carne».
languages.original_text: "That the Imperium is a rotting corpse, as is its worthless master. Worms writhe inside its guts, praying to the putrescent husk, believing that it will protect them from the storm. They swallow the damp flesh, smack their lips, and vomit it into each other's throats, gorging, choking. And all the while, the crumbling corpse only continues to rot away. Storms and carrion eaters pick the reeking flesh off its brittle bones, piece by piece, as the frightened worms struggle to mend the gaping wounds with their own flesh."

languages.text: 「あの帝国というものは、その無価値な主と同じく腐った死体なのだ。その内臓には蛆がはびこり、腐敗した殻へと祈りを捧げ、嵐から身を守ってくれると信じている。彼らは湿った肉を飲み込み、唇を尖らせて互いの喉に嘔吐し、貪り食い、窒息させる。その間も、崩れ落ちた死体は腐り続けるだけだ。嵐と腐肉喰らいたちが、もろくなった骨から悪臭を放つ肉を一枚一枚剥ぎ取っていくのだ。怯えた虫けらが自らの肉で傷口を修復しようともがいている間に」
languages.original_text: "That the Imperium is a rotting corpse, as is its worthless master. Worms writhe inside its guts, praying to the putrescent husk, believing that it will protect them from the storm. They swallow the damp flesh, smack their lips, and vomit it into each other's throats, gorging, choking. And all the while, the crumbling corpse only continues to rot away. Storms and carrion eaters pick the reeking flesh off its brittle bones, piece by piece, as the frightened worms struggle to mend the gaping wounds with their own flesh."

languages.text: “帝国是一具朽烂的尸体，正如它不值一提的主人一样。蠹虫在它的内脏里蠕动，向它腐烂的躯壳祈祷，以为这具尸体能保护它们免受风暴的侵袭。它们吞下阴湿的腐肉，咂着嘴唇，之后把肉吐到其他蠹虫的喉咙里，让它们大快朵颐。这具摇摇欲坠的尸体只会继续腐烂，风暴与腐食者从它脆弱的骨头上剥下一块块臭气熏天的烂肉，而受惊的蠹虫挣扎着，用自己的肉来修补伤口。”
languages.original_text: "That the Imperium is a rotting corpse, as is its worthless master. Worms writhe inside its guts, praying to the putrescent husk, believing that it will protect them from the storm. They swallow the damp flesh, smack their lips, and vomit it into each other's throats, gorging, choking. And all the while, the crumbling corpse only continues to rot away. Storms and carrion eaters pick the reeking flesh off its brittle bones, piece by piece, as the frightened worms struggle to mend the gaping wounds with their own flesh."

languages.text: "Dass das Imperium ein verfaulter Kadaver ist, genau wie sein wertloser Meister. In seinen Eingeweiden winden sich Würmer, die die verwesende Hülle anbeten, weil sie glauben, sie würde sie vor dem Sturm bewahren. Sie fressen das feuchte Fleisch, schmatzen mit ihren Lippen und erbrechen es würgend in ihre eigenen Kehlen. Und währenddessen verfault der zerfallene Leichnam einfach weiter. Stürme und Aasfresser picken das stinkende Fleisch Stück für Stück von seinen morschen Knochen, während die verängstigten Würmer versuchen, die klaffenden Wunden mit ihrem eigenen Fleisch zu schließen."
languages.original_text: "That the Imperium is a rotting corpse, as is its worthless master. Worms writhe inside its guts, praying to the putrescent husk, believing that it will protect them from the storm. They swallow the damp flesh, smack their lips, and vomit it into each other's throats, gorging, choking. And all the while, the crumbling corpse only continues to rot away. Storms and carrion eaters pick the reeking flesh off its brittle bones, piece by piece, as the frightened worms struggle to mend the gaping wounds with their own flesh."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un da onun işe yaramaz efendisinin de çürüyen bir cesetten başka bir şey olmadığı. Midesinde solucanlar dolanan İmparatorluk, çürümüş bir kabuğa dua ediyor ve bu kabuğun onu fırtınadan koruyacağına inanıyor. Vıcık vıcık bir eti yutuyor, ağızlarını şapırdatıyor ve onu birbirlerinin boğazına kusuyorlar, tıkınıyorlar, boğuluyorlar. Bu sırada da dökülen ceset, çürümeye devam ediyor. Fırtınalar ve leşçiller, kırılgan kemiklerini parça parça eşeliyor; korkmuş solucanlar da açık yaraları kendi bedenleriyle dikmeye çalışıyor."
languages.original_text: "That the Imperium is a rotting corpse, as is its worthless master. Worms writhe inside its guts, praying to the putrescent husk, believing that it will protect them from the storm. They swallow the damp flesh, smack their lips, and vomit it into each other's throats, gorging, choking. And all the while, the crumbling corpse only continues to rot away. Storms and carrion eaters pick the reeking flesh off its brittle bones, piece by piece, as the frightened worms struggle to mend the gaping wounds with their own flesh."
